A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Did questions posed by The Force Awakens keep you intrigued and exited for the past 2 years? Well prepare to hate the answers when finally unveiled. This film has poor pacing\, stand still character development (for most)\, and jokes that land as rarely as the movie exites. All while giving an underwhelming end to new and old loved characters alike. There is nothing to look forward too in it's next installment\, and that's a major problem.
